name: Athens AngularJS Meetup
description: A group focused on the goodies javascript brings to applications development. Of course AngularJS is the leader to create and structure responsive applications, SPA and realtime interfaces no matter which language we use for the backend (php5, nodeJS, ruby etc). Many other players try to make some impression like ReactJS, EmberJS so a modern developer has to keep learning and modernising his/her skills. This group is created for guys who really want to follow latest web development techniques and love javascript. Come join us and just share your experience with us because learning is a never ending process!!

name: GreeceJS
description:
Welcome to GreeceJS! 

A bi-monthly celebration and exploration of the JavaScript programming language. This is a place to share knowledge, ask questions, learn and grumble. If you are interested in speaking or sponsoring please contact one of the organizers. 

Sign up and join us!

name: Athens Friends Meetup
description:
Expat or resident in Athens, Greece? Join us and change your life!!

Make new friends in an international environment with "Meet Up"

organizer.name: Alexia
organizer.bio: Hi! I am Alexia half Greek half German and was living for some time in England. I am happy to meet new friends and happy to connect you to each other. Other than that I design and make Jewellery. Looking forwards to meeting you!

name: Docker Athens
description:
Meet other developers and ops engineers using Docker. Docker is an open platform for developers and sysadmins to build, ship, and run distributed applications. Consisting of Docker Engine, a portable, lightweight runtime and packaging tool, and Docker Hub, a cloud service for sharing applications and automating workflows, Docker enables apps to be quickly assembled from components and eliminates the friction between development, QA, and production environments. As a result, IT can ship faster and run the same app, unchanged, on laptops, data center VMs, and any cloud.

Learn more about Docker at http://www.docker.com

name: Agile Greece
description:
A community of agile practitioners and for anyone interested in agile principles and practices like Scrum, XP, Lean, Kanban, Test Driven Development, Product Ownership etc... Our mission is to share knowledge and increase agile adoption in Greece.

Follow the discussion at LinkedIn group or at Agile Greece web site. Twitter:@AgileGreeceOrg

name: Athens IoT Meetup
description:
A meetup for Internet of Things enthusiasts in Athens!

Purpose of this meetup is to help build the IoT community in Athens, bring people of different backgrounds in touch and build synergies, share interesting stories, inform and inspire. 

Would you like to suggest a topic/speaker? Do you have an idea you'd like to share with everyone? Use this meetup group or @iotathens to keep conversations connected.

Also, we'll be sending out a monthly newsletter to group members with community news.
If you have exciting news/events you'd like to share with the group please message us.

organizer.name: Apostolis Michalakos
organizer.bio:
Mixing business operations and marketing.  
Commercial manager at Resin.io

name: Appsterdam Greece
description:
You have come to the best place in the world to be and become an App Maker.

If you want to make movies, go to Hollywood. 
If you want to make musicals, go to Broadway. 
If you want to make Apps, go to Appsterdam.

— Mike Lee, Mayor and founder of Appsterdam

Our goal is to bring App Makers together, and our mission is to support their interests worldwide. We founded Appsterdam - the world capital of Apps - to establish a centre of gravity for our industry, to provide a place where all App Makers can gather, and to create a framework for people to give back and support the community.

Check out the the group in Amsterdam.

name: Cafe Society Greece
description:
We are a global socialising society for people, who want to share and experience social outings and events we all love to do;

in the pursuit of fun, friendship, fulfilment and wellbeing.

We wish to be the observers of the mind and pathfinder of the heart.

To find out what you are interested in, to experience, to share, to learn in our society.

Who are we?

We are an international group of men and women.

What we do?

We leave our worries behind.

We support and encourage local people, expatriates and visitors in their pursuit of friendship, sharing and more!

What we offer at Cafe Society?

    Cafe Society "Cafe Clubs"

    Cafe Society "Excursions"

    Cafe Society "Home Parties"

    Cafe Society "Nightlife"

    Cafe Society "Outdoors"

    Cafe Society "Singles"

    Cafe Society "Wellness"

Where we meet?

In cafés, bars, restaurants, tavernas, theatres, gigs, dance studios, activity centres, excursion points, informal dinner parties / gatherings in our own homes.

In our “Café Society International” we definitely make new friends and feel free to express our selves, learning, laughing, joking, dancing and maybe, even meeting our soul mate.

Certainly we experience something new and different!

organizer.name: IoannisRoussis
organizer.bio: Γεννήθηκα σε ελληνικό τοπίο, νιώθω πολίτης της γης, θαυμάζω τη φύση, με συγκινεί η αγάπη των ζώων, η παιδική ματιά, με έλκει η αύρα των αυθεντικών ανθρώπων, εκτιμώ το βάθος της σκέψης, την ειλικρίνεια, τη φιλία, τιμώ το άρωμα της γυναίκας που αγαπώ.

next_event.name: Απολαύσετε τα φιλιά στο Βρυσάκι Μπαρ // Enjoy the kisses at Vrissaki Bar!

name: Meteor Athens, Greece
description: Meet other developers using Meteor. Share your knowledge, apps, and get feedback from others. Meteor is an open-source platform for building top-quality web apps in a fraction of the time, whether you're an expert developer or just getting started.

name: Athens OpenStack User Group
description:
This is the Athens OpenStack user and developer meet-up. We are a group of software engineers who are engaged in the OpenStack project. Everyone is encouraged to join and contribute!

More on this OpenStack User Group

organizer.name: Thanassis Parathyras
organizer.bio: I am working with Linux systems over for the past 10 years. Today i have the role of CTO in StackMasters providing IaaS solution based on OpenStack technology, after running several projects as the Technical Director in Virtual Trip.

name: Athens Laravel Meetup
description: Athens Laravel Meetup is a group for anyone interested in web development. We mainly focus in PHP and the use of Laravel framework but we are open to all related frameworks/technologies.

name: Athens World Cinema and Theater Meetup
description:
This meet up group is specifically aimed at cinema/theatre lovers. It will run all year round on the last Wednesday evening of each month (more or less). For this season’s events, we have chosen two of our favourite winter venues – Mikro Kosmo, Singrou Fix/ Asty, Petit Palais for worldwide cinema productions and Theater Neou Kosmou (which often has a choice of several interesting productions from writers around the world). Both venues have cosy bar areas to give us time to meet and greet each other before performances and during intervals. After the film/theatre production, those who wish to, can stay behind to share views on what we have seen. We will post details of meet up time plus film/show we are going to see around ten days beforehand. In the case of our theatre months (November, January and March), this will give you time to book and reserve your seat. If you are interested, let’s get together. We hope you’ll join this group, and we look forward to seeing you soon at one of the events. 

Η ομάδα μας απευθύνεται στους λάτρεις του σινεμά και του θεάτρου. Στόχος μας είναι να καθιερώσουμε συναντήσεις την τελευταία Τετάρτη κάθε μήνα. Για τις συναντήσεις αυτής της χρονιάς επιλέξαμε και προτείνουμε δύο από τους αγαπημένους μας χώρους: το σινεμά Μικρόκοσμο (στάση μετρό Fix – Συγγρού), Το Άστυ (Κοραή), το Πτι Παλαί (Ριζάρη) όπου προβάλλονται ενδιαφέρουσες διεθνείς κινηματογραφικές παραγωγές, και τη θεατρική σκηνή του Νέου Kόσμου που προσφέρει περισσότερες ενδιαφέρουσες επιλογές και θεατρικές παραγωγές κάθε χρονιά. Και οι δύο χώροι βρίσκονται σε κεντρικό σημείο, διαθέτουν ευχάριστο καφέ- μπαρ όπου μπορούμε να συναντηθούμε και να μιλήσουμε πριν, κατά τα διαλείμματα και μετά την παράσταση. Μετά την παράσταση, όσοι θέλουν, μπορούν να ανταλλάξουν απόψεις και να συνεχίσουν την κουβέντα . Θα δημοσιεύσουμε στοιχεία των παραστάσεων και σημείου συνάντησης δέκα ημέρες πριν από κάθε εκδήλωση. Τους μήνες των θεατρικών μας συναντήσεων, θα έχουμε έτσι το χρόνο να κλείσουμε τα εισιτήριά μας και να κρατήσουμε θέση εγκαίρως. Αν αγαπάτε το σινεμά και το θέατρο και την κουβέντα όπως και εμείς, ελάτε να συναντηθούμε στη νέα μας ομάδα. Ελπίζουμε να τα πούμε σύντομα από κοντά στις εκδηλώσεις μας.

name: Project Management - Building the World
description:
This Group is about Project Management and Project Managers,
methodologies, bets practices, tools, roles, programs, portfolios and
networking.

Audience: Project/Program/Portfolio Managers, Team Leaders, PMOs, senior developers and business managers.

Why to Join: For networking, to learn from formal workshops and from our
shares experiences, for participating in discussion on recent trends, tools
and best practices.

Organizer: TheCube, Open Support Grid 

Coordinator: Spyros Ktenas, IT/Business/Social Project Manager, tools author, hobbyist developer, article writer, more than 100 successful projects. He holds an MBA, BSc in IT, PMI-PfMP (the first PfMP in southeastern Europe), PRINCE2, PMI-ACP, Google QI, Drupal Assoc.

name: Startup Grind Athens
description: Startup Grind is an event series and website designed to help educate, inspire, and connect local entrepreneurs. Each month we welcome an amazing speaker who shares their story with our community and tells us what worked, what didn't, and what they'll do differently next time. It's an amazing opportunity to learn from the best, network with other members of the startup community, and improve your chances of entrepreneurial success.

next_event.name: Startup Grind Athens Hosts Networking Event (Season Closing Party)

name: I love 3D - Athens
description: For both web designers and software developers - 3D on the WEB Night - Modeling, VR, WebGL and Three.js - make 3D models even more immersive and engaging on the WEB

name: Glyfada Toastmasters - Improve your Public Speaking
description:
Mission
The mission of Toastmasters Glyfada is to provide a mutually supportive and positive learning environment in which every member has the opportunity to develop communication and leadership skills, which in turn foster self-confidence and personal growth.

Description
At Toastmasters participants get the skills and confidence to express themselves effectively in any situation and overcome their public speaking anxiety by giving and receiving constructive feedback and becoming better listeners.The Club provides all members the opportunity to develop communication and leadership skills, which foster self-confidence and personal growth.

How does it work?
A Toastmasters meeting is a learn-by-doing workshop in which participants hone their speaking and leadership skills in a no-pressure atmosphere.

There is no instructor in a Toastmasters meeting. Instead, members evaluate one another’s presentations. This feedback process is a key part of the program’s success.

Meeting participants also give impromptu talks on assigned topics, conduct meetings and develop skills related to timekeeping, grammar and parliamentary procedure.

Members learn communication skills by working in the Competent Communication manual, a series of 10 self-paced speaking assignments designed to instil a basic foundation in public speaking.

Toastmasters has no teachers nor instructors. There are only people like you who improve their skills through practice in a friendly, fun and supportive environment. We foster this environment together by helping each other.

name: Prod.Active Meetup
description: This is a group of active people talking about products. The Meetups provide a great opportunity to listen to industry experts, participate in workshops, interact and share experiences. We welcome all people from all disciplines that love to think and talk about products. Be Prod.Active join the Meetup.

name: Athens Bitcoins Meetup
description: Μια ομάδα για όσους ενδιαφέρονται για το Bitcoin και γενικότερα την ψηφιακή οικονομία. Όλα τα επίπεδα δεξιοτήτων είναι ευπρόσδεκτα. Ξεκίνησα αυτή την ομάδα για να συναντήσω ενθουσιώδεις υποστηρικτές της ψηφιακής οικονομίας και των εφαρμογών της

name: Athens Bullseye Meetup
description: Inspired by Gabriel Weinberg's (DuckDuckGo) and Justin Mares's book "Traction," our community is dedicated to adding structure and clarity to the pursuit of traction. "Almost every failed startup has a product. What failed startups don't have are enough customers." While there are many methodologies for product development - Lean Startup being the most popular - there are none that explicitly deal with getting traction. After interviewing over forty successful founders, Gabe and Justin recognized patterns and synthesized them into a framework for getting traction called "Bullseye." "What Lean is to product development, Bullseye is to traction. With Lean, you figure out the right features to build. With Bullseye, you figure out the right traction channel to pursue." -Traction This is for all startup founders and employees.

name: Athens Yoga & Wellness Meetup
description:
This is a group for anyone interested in yoga, meditation, health and wellness activities in and out of Athens.

We are a community of like minded people and we are looking forward to meeting new people in Athens that would like to join our community. The base of our Meetup group is at Bhavana Yoga Center in Monastiraki, a center for body and mind practices. Welcome to our group!

next_event.name: We start our Day with a Saturday Yoga Community Class
